content: a classic pattern with a modern twist the easy ombre crochet chevron blanket by love life yarn is a classic pattern that has been reimagined with a contemporary flair this blanket features a timeless chevron design elevated by the use of ombre teal yarn the result is a visually stunning piece that is not just a blanket but a work of art design inspiration the pattern was inspired by the designer s love for the calming effects of the sea and sky the chosen shade of teal reflects this inspiration creating a blanket that not only warms you but also soothes your senses the zigzag pattern is easy to master making it a perfect project for beginners and seasoned crocheters alike materials you ll need yarn we crochet wonderfluff in turquoise heather 3 skeins crochet hook us size l 8 00mm notions yarn needle and scissors techniques and skill level this pattern is very beginner-friendly and utilizes basic stitches like single_crochet and chains the pattern has a two-row repeat making it easy to memorize and work on while multitasking finished size and gauge finished size approximately 34 x 48 gauge 15 sts and 10 row = 4 10cm in chevron pattern whether you re looking to gift a new baby or brighten up your living space this easy ombre crochet chevron blanket is a versatile and delightful project the pattern is easy to follow and the end result is a cozy eye-catching blanket that you ll be proud to show off
